metadata.subject: France. Assemblée nationale législative (1791-1792). Comité de liquidation
Corruption
metadata.title: Rapport et projet de décret concernant les citoyens Letellier, Pyrot, Robouam, Soret, Lucy, Claye, Mericamp, Debrange, Hennequin, Adam, Ramel, ex-législateurs, & Demarivaux, agent du ci-devant roi /

France. Convention nationale

metadata.description: At head of title: Convention nationale
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
Investigation of corruption charges involving the liquidation of pensions in the royal household
Forms part of the French Revolution Collection at the Newberry Library
metadata.notes: Book is missing pages 98/99. Title and cover are combined. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages.
